queries.text: How do I make chocolate chip cookies from scratch?
What are quick healthy breakfast options for busy mornings?

documents.text: Classic chocolate chip cookie recipe: Mix 1 cup softened butter with 3/4 cup brown sugar and 3/4 cup white sugar until creamy. Beat in 2 eggs and 2 tsp vanilla. Combine 2 1/4 cups flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt and gradually add to mixture. Fold in 2 cups chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375°F for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.

q1.explanation: Perfect score - Complete recipe with all ingredients, measurements, steps, and baking temperature/time

q2.explanation: Not relevant - Cookies are not a quick healthy breakfast option
